alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 2:35PM MST until January 28 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with 4 to 8 inches expected in the Ogden Valley. Wind gusting to 30 mph will result in areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, and result in snow covered roadways at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
